divs: Sighting DetailsThis event happened just in front of my home. 4 objects looked like slow moving, dim stars going across the sky. Objects each appeared for only a couple of minutes and appeared in different parts of the sky. Objects were not all visible at the same time. Objects also moved in different directions. Objects moved in straight lines. Objects were barely visible to the eye. No sound with objects.Event took place between 8 and 8:30 PM on a mostly clear night.
Summary: 4 objects looked like slow moving, dim stars going across the sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Marrero
This sighting has never been favorited.
